name: RadiantOne VDS Database Schema
summary: Learn about .ORX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ORX files are saved in an XML format and contain object classes and attributes for database files used by RadiantOne VDS software.
NOTE: ".ORx" may also be short for .ORG or .OR2 - .OR6, which are file extensions used by Lotus Organizer.

description: Database schema the defines the structure of a database used by the Radiant One Virtual Directory Server (VDS); may be captured from an existing database using the Database Schema Extractor and can be modified using the Schema Manager within RadiantOne.
